branchCategory.name: C(D)VRB1, Vane Rotary Actuator w/Solenoid Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>The CVRB1 series is a vane style rotary actuator with solenoid valve. Available bore sizes include 50, 63, 80 and 100mm. There are two mounting styles (basic or foot) and either single or double vane types to choose from. Other options include auto switch capability.</p>
